content: baby pandemonium pattern is written in uk terms materials required scraps and leftovers of your chosen weight yarn approximately 500g if using dk a crochet hook appropriate for your chosen weight yarn scissors stitch markers a needle ©2020 lyndas craft room & the wee house of crochet for the crochet sanctuary this pattern should not be copied sold or posted online without permission you may sell finished items as long as credit is given to the designers pattern notes abbreviations odd numbered row are slip_stitch slip_stitch the right side of your chain chain work even numbers are double_crochet double_crochet the wrong side half_double_crochet half treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet colour changes are made dtr double treble_crochet in the last yarn over of the mb make bobble final stitch of a row bst bead stitch - treble_crochet *yarn over insert the hook around the previous treble_crochet from front to back yarn when you ch1 at the end over pull up a loop repeat from * a further 2 of a row this is a turning times 7 loops on the hook yarn over and pull chain and not a stitch through all 7 loops place your first stitch of bb bobble yarn over twice insert hook into the row into the last stitch stitch yarn over pull up a loop yarn over pull of the previous row this through two loops yarn over pull through two should help to keep your loops repeat a further 4 times yarn over and sides straight and will help pull though all loops on hook the border sit nicely 4tr cluster four treble cluster *yarn over insert hook into st yarn over pull up a loop yarn over instructions placed inside pull through two loops repeat from * a further brackets are to be three times 5 loops on hook yarn over and pull repeated through all 5 loops for example double_crochet x3 mb x pop popcorn - work 5 treble crochets in the 2 would mean you double same stitch drop the loop from your hook and crochet in 3 stitches make insert your hook from back to front in the first a bobble double_crochet treble_crochet you made place the dropped loop back on in 3 stitches and make a your hook and pull through the stitch bobble you then follow any further instructions for the row count your stitches on plain double_crochet half_double_crochet or treble_crochet row to make sure you keep to the stitch count of 106 stitches you wont have 106 stitches on some row so check your count on the plain row ©2020 lyndas craft room & the wee house of crochet for the crochet sanctuary this pattern should not be copied sold or posted online without permission you may sell finished items as long as credit is given to the designers ch108 row 1 treble_crochet in the 4th chain from hook treble_crochet across ch1 and turn 106 row 2 treble_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1
